message:
IWUDC Updates
One of our fresher members, Aneeta James, broke as an adjudicator at Indian Women's University Debating Championships, 2019.
We congratulate her on this feat and wish her more success :’)

We are delighted to announce the election of Tiyasha Mitra, Astha Jakher, Mirambika Sikdar and Syamantak Srikrishnan as Governors of Debating Society for the academic session of 2019-20. 
All the best!

story: Jacob Franco shared a post to Debating Society,IIT  Kharagpur's timeline.
message: Jacob Franco shared a post to Debating Society,IIT Kharagpur's timeline. “Journalism can never be silent: That is its greatest virtue and its greatest fault. It must speak, and speak immediately, while the echoes of wonder, the claims of triumph and the signs of horror are still in the air" - Henry Anatole Grunwald. Presenting to you- The International Press. Gear up for a more integrated experience of the Model United Nations as applications for the 'International Press' are live. Seize the opportunity because it's now or never. Apply for the experience of reporter, photographer, and illustrator as a delegate of International Press at St. Stephen's Model United Nations 2019. Apply now at: https://tinyurl.com/smun19ipress

story: Jacob Franco shared a post to Debating Society,IIT  Kharagpur's timeline.
message: Jacob Franco shared a post to Debating Society,IIT Kharagpur's timeline. The essence of art is not to portray but to evoke. The International Press is a solitary committee covering the other committees. Want your work to be cherished even after the event? Try your hand out as a photographer, reporter and illustrator as a Delegate of International Press at St. Stephen’s Model United Nations 2019. Presenting you a golden opportunity to bring your creativity alive and not just a mere race where the only intent is to win. Strive to be the best and earn positions and rewards worthy of your skills. Please follow the link below to register: https://goo.gl/forms/gCkOCLibx1rxpcEu2

Hey there!

We are delighted to inform you that *Amity Business School*, *Amity Lucknow* is coming up with the 5th Edition of the *I Believe Debate challenge* which is to be held on 18th & 19th September 2018.

With a colossal achievement in the previous four seasons of the *I BELIEVE DEBATE CHALLENGE* this year we are expecting a footfall from more than 100  colleges and universities from all around the nation.

The competition will be on the *Mace Debating format* and comprise of two rounds- preliminary round on September 18th, 2018 (11:00 am- 4:00 pm) as an elimination round where 8 teams would be shortlisted to appear in the final round on September 19th, 2018 (10:00 am- 1:00 pm). 

E-mail us at ibelieveabslko@gmail.com or drop us a message on WhatsApp at +917895692562 to receive the official invitation letter and more information regarding the competition. 

To register yourself fill the form below-
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfjTXzT4C9eWczXYHCO5AlpjY0TnFGZiAivOFhuAX1BorvE5A/viewform

Follow us on Instagram-
https://www.instagram.com/i.believe.2018/

For further information-
E-mail us at ibelieveabslko@gmail.com  
Call us at +917017490417, +917706874480, +919473647740

Regards
The Organising Secretariat
I BELIEVE 2018
Amity Business School, Amity University Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh

story: Debating Society,IIT  Kharagpur is with Vignesh Viswanathan and 3 others.
message:
Debating Society, IIT Kharagpur congratulates its contingent to the Inter IIT Social and Cultural Meet for their gold-winning performance.
The Parliamentary debate had Vishal Chauhan, Partha Kadambi and Gyan Darshan as debaters, and Tanay Jagani, Aradhana Kumar and Vignesh Viswanathan as adjudicators and we secured gold in the event this year as well retaining our title as defending champions.
The Turncoat event had Rohit Sar and Chandar Siddarth participating and we bagged a gold in this event as well.
Congratulations to all of them!!

The Parliamentary debate had Vishal Chauhan, Partha Kadambi and Gyan Darshan as debaters, and Tanay Jagani, Aradhana Kumar and Vignesh Viswanathan as adjudicators and we secured gold in the event this year as well retaining our title as defending champions.
The Turncoat event had Rohit Sar and Chandar Siddarth participating and we bagged a gold in this event as well.
Congratulations to all of them!!

message:
Escalation.

From quiet interruptions, the pace slowly quickens towards boorish rebuttals and personal attacks. Tempers rise, ready to explode at the drop of a hat. Slurs are heaped mercilessly and before you know it, there's kicking and scratching and a full scale brawl. Well, almost.

But that right there? 
That is everything we are not. Join us, and you'll see for yourself.

Pro.Verb 2017. 
Debating done right.                        

Register Now: 
https://goo.gl/w8WB4r

For any queries:
Send us a mail at: proverbsoc@gmail.com

story: Anjeeta Singh shared a video to Debating Society,IIT  Kharagpur's timeline.
message: Anjeeta Singh shared a video to Debating Society,IIT Kharagpur's timeline. #9thCNLUPD - REGISTRATIONS OPEN: We are proud to announce that the first round of registrations for the 9th CNLU National Parliamentary Debate is now open.The first round of registration closes on the 20th of September. The links for registration are below, hurry and apply! As this video takes you to a trip down the memory lane, a few details about the 9th CNLU National Parliamentary Debate that you must know: • The dates of this 9th edition of the CNLU National Parliamentary Debate are 13th to 15th October, 2017. • With cash prize worth rs.1.85 lacs at stake, you would not want to miss this! • The tournament will follow a 3x3 Asian Parliamentary form of debating. • It being an open tournament, age or institution will not play any role in your participation. • The registration fee for the tournament is 1800/per participant which includes accommodation and food for all three days of the tournament. (9 meals) • The Adj. Core panel comprises Taufique Shoogufan, Adhiraj Mukerji, Chaitali Sinha and Prasun Bhaiya. Registration links: http://bit.ly/2wSrfob - Institutional Teams! http://bit.ly/2vsL0iz - Cross-Teams! http://bit.ly/2xDwIN0 - Independent Adjudicator! We are providing Adj. subsidies as well! CVs, in order to apply for Adj. subsidy, can be mailed to debsoc.cnlu@gmail.com. For more details, call: Shiksha- +918544148624 Somit- +919102937757
